title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hated person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hated person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hated person in a dreamThe interpretation of a dream about seeing a hated person in a dream could be a reference to some hateful people, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a hated person, this may indicate his relationship with the person in real life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If An unmarried girl saw an evil man, this may indicate goodness, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees a hated individual, this can lead to hatred towards her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams about someone hurting me on my hand in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone hurting me on my hand in a dream. Seeing the wound on the hand It could mean that I earn money, and God Almighty knows the unseen. Seeing a married man cutting off his hand may mean that you are avoiding sins, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a wound on the right hand indicates a financial gain, and God Almighty is high, while seeing a wound on the hand can express problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams for someone who hates me And he gives me money in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone who hates me giving me money in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing this. However, seeing someone giving me money but refusing in a dream could be a sign of financial losses, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a married man sees someone giving him money but refusing, this may be evidence of reckless decisions, and God knows the unseen. When he sees The dreamer is someone who gives him money, it may express a benefit, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams of my enemy giving me food in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my enemy giving me food in a dream. We did not find clear meanings to see this. However, seeing someone giving me food could mean divine providence, God willing. It could represent Seeing someone giving you food is a source of sustenance from where you least expect it, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer sees someone feeding him, this may lead to a sudden gift and an unexpected surprise, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about reconciling my enemy with me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about reconciling my enemy with me in a dream can That reconciliation with me indicates reconciliation, and God knows the unseen, as it can indicate freedom from problems with God knows best. When the dreamer sees reconciliation, it can indicate positive changes, God willing, and if a married woman sees reconciliation, it may indicate a high status, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream A person is crying in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing a person crying and sad can convey bad news, and God Almighty is Most High. When you see a person crying as if he is sad, it may express his invalid psychological state, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. It can also indicate helplessness. And weakness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about praying for someone who hurt me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about praying for someone who hurt me in a dream. Praying for the oppressor may indicate hearing the supplication, and God knows best. Likewise, if the dreamer sees a supplication for someone who has wronged him, this may lead to injustice, and God is Most High and everyone knows. In the event that the dreamer sees himself praying for harm against

title: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing a dead president in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a dead president in a dream Seeing a dead president in a dream has many different meanings for the dreamer, depending on whether he is single or married, and the issue is different if he is pregnant, so we will explain in our article the details related to his dream. The dead president and the interpretations it carries. Seeing the dead president in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the dead president in a dream? Seeing the dead president in a dream is interpreted as a variety of matters for the fortuneteller, as some interpreters claim that it is among the happy things that entail food and money for the person. Related This vision reflects the qualities present in the person who saw it, as it shows his tendency to do good and do good deeds, his intense love for those around him, and his extreme generosity. As for seeing the grave of the late president, it is a clear indication of the ease of the dreamer’s affairs and his closeness to accomplishing the tasks that he seeks to accomplish to the fullest extent, in addition to To be good news for the fulfillment of happy dreams. Seeing the deceased president in a dream and the person’s desire to sit in his own seat is not considered a good vision because it carries a sign of death and loss, whether for the person himself or for someone from his family. Most interpretation experts believe that this vision expresses victory and happiness. The severe consequences that result from it, as a person obtains his rights from those who wronged him and the evil of others is removed from him after seeing him. Peace be upon the dead president shows that circumstances have changed and improved for the better. If one wants to get married, he will be happy and walk with a special life partner who brings him happiness. If he wants to travel, this matter will come true after the dream, and God knows best. Walking in the funeral of the late president is a good omen for its owner, as it brings him closer to the goals he set in life, and enables him to achieve them and do them well. What is the interpretation of seeing the dead president in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Confirms Ibn Sirin varied the interpretations related to seeing the dead president in a dream and said that the closest meaning to this topic is that the person who saw the vision gets a lot of money in a short time and earns it from a job or inherited from it. Relatives. He says that it indicates that a person is approaching his hopes and plans for himself to achieve them soon, if he sees the grave of this president. Ibn Sirin shows that the dreamer gets his desire to travel after his dream of the dead president, and through this opportunity he reaps a lot of profits and sees many places in The world that he wanted to see. Ibn Sirin mentions that the vision, may God bless him and grant him peace, is one of the praiseworthy visions that a person has. He stands out among those around him after he saw him as a result of the important position that he will obtain in his work and will make it a big deal in the coming days. And in the case of sitting with The dead president and eating with him, this is one of the most promising visions in the opinion of Ibn Sirin, because the dreamer reaps goodness and blessings after the dream, and God knows best. To know the interpretations of other dreams of Ibn Sirin, go to Google and type the Egyptian dream interpretation site... You will find everything you are looking for Seeing a dead president in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried woman sees a dead president in her dream

title: Interpretation of mentioning God in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of mentioning God in a dream through this article. God Almighty said: “O leaders, disclose to me my vision if I translate it into a vision” (43). This is what today's encyclopedia shows you in this article, follow us.Interpretation of the remembrance of God in a dreamInterpretation of the remembrance of God in a dream by Ibn SirinThe remembrance of God Almighty in general, and especially the saying “God is Great” is one of the visions that portend to the beholder an abundance of goodness coming to him and happiness for him.From He saw in a dream that he was saying: “God is great.” This vision symbolizes the dreamer’s sincere repentance from all the sins and evil he has committed. Also, seeing the saying “God is great” in a dream is one of the good visions that are considered good news from God Almighty in the face of the dreamer of his imminent victory over the enemies. Saying “God is great” in a dream means That the dreamer will be able to reach what he is looking for and will achieve all his dreams and goals in life. In the name of God Almighty in a dream. Seeing the mention of the name of God Almighty in a dream expresses guidance and repentance from God Almighty to the dreamer, and it also expresses his victory over all desires and sins. Among its interpretations is that May God give him goodness, nourishment, an end to worries and pain, the fulfillment of dreams, and a quick recovery if he is sick. Mentioning the name of God in a married woman’s dreamIf a married woman sees in a dream that she is mentioning the name of God Almighty. This vision expresses that this woman will be granted a speedy recovery by God Almighty if she is sick, but if she goes through a state of sadness and sorrow. It is a sign that he will soon get rid of this condition. If she sees that her husband mentions God Almighty in a dream. Good news for her that she will become pregnant soon. Seeing the mention of God in general in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the woman’s closeness to God Almighty and good tidings of the abundance of goodness that will come to her. Mention that the dream: There is no god but God, if one sees in his dream “There is no god but God.” This vision expresses happiness, goodness, and joy in the dreamer’s life. If you see the mention of “There is no god but God” in the dream of a person burdened with worries. This vision is one of the good visions that predicts the end of all the dreamer’s sorrows and worries soon, and that God Almighty will give him abundant goodness. Interpretation of a dream about mentioning God and seeking forgiveness. Seeing forgiveness in general in a dream represents victory over enemies, liberation from all problems, and that the dreamer will be able to achieve all His ambitions. If a person sees in a dream that he repeatedly said, “I ask forgiveness from God Almighty.” It is good news that God will bless this person and prolong his life, and one of its interpretations is that goodness and contentment will reach this person. As for seeing the cover of seeking forgiveness in a dream. It expresses the hypocrisy, lies, and deception that characterize this person. Interpretation of saying “Oh God” in a dream: Seeing yourself saying “Oh God” in general in a dream is one of the good visions that portend the coming of abundant goodness, and getting rid of all problems and worries. If a person in a dream hears another person saying: "Oh, my God"? This vision is good news for the pioneer to hear happy news and joy will soon come in his life. Interpretation of saying glory to God in a dream: Seeing glory in a dream generally symbolizes liberation from all worry and anxiety, and getting rid of

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing acne in a dream - a symbol of acne in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing acne in a dream - a symbol of acne in a dream. Pimples and pimples in a dream have many meanings, and interpreters differed on this matter. Some believe that if pimples burst and ooze pus, they indicate the nail and its duration. In warts, scabies, smallpox, etc., long narrow funds appear. Smallpox is a surplus of money. Likewise, sores. As for whoever sees pimples appearing on his face, these are worries that he faces and they go away, and God knows best. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beard shaving in a dream - a symbol of shaving a beard in a dream. Ibn Sirin indicated the interpretation of seeing acne in a dream, so that seeing it is something desirable, according to Despite the fact that it is a nightmare for everyone in waking life. Seeing the pimples break off and the liquid coming out of them in a dream. If a man in a dream sees his face full of pimples, his vision indicates that the dreamer is waiting for a happy event. Seeing only one love in the face, the dream indicates that the owner The vision: He loves a woman who controls his heart, conscience, and emotions. As for the one who sees his hand full of grains in his dream, his vision indicates that he will obtain money with these grains. As for the one who sees in a dream that his leg is full of grains and pimples, his vision indicates that the dreamer will gain a lot of money. Money from travel or trade. Seeing a large pimple on the brain indicates that the dreamer will be proficient in knowledge and may become a scholar, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about acne for a single woman: Seeing acne in a single woman on her face portends goodness, and perhaps these pimples indicate The presence of money if they are black grains. But if an unmarried woman sees red grains in a dream, then seeing them in a dream indicates the presence of connection and joy. If the grains are brown, then in a dream they mean prowess in work, and in general, grains for girls mean happiness and pleasure And superiority. As for an unmarried woman who sees birth control pills spread over her body, this indicates that she will love a specific person in her life. Spots and pimples in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolize that her personality is characterized by a lot of passion and romance. Seeing pink pills in an unmarried woman’s dream is A sign of the joy and happiness that she will have in her life. Interpretation of a dream about acne for a married woman. If a married woman sees acne on her face in a dream, this indicates the goodness of the woman she sees in the eyes of her partner. If a married woman sees red pimples on her body, this vision means. That the woman with the vision will remain beautiful and young even if she is over fifty years old. Interpretation of the dream of seeing acne: If a married woman sees black pimples, her sight indicates a lot of money. But if a married woman sees red pimples in her stomach in a dream, her sight indicates the approaching Pregnancy may indicate recovery from a disease. Seeing pimples as if they were common boils on the hand or body and emitting brown water indicates that problems and troubles have stopped for her. Interpretation of a dream about acne for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her face

title: Learn the interpretation of walking on water in a dream for a single woman from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Walking on water in a dream for a single woman In a dream, a person faces many different and strange things, and a girl can see herself walking on water in her dream, and from here she begins to search until she knows the meaning that the subject carries for her, is she happy? Something or the opposite? Through this topic, we explain to you the meaning of walking on water in a dream for a single woman. Walking on water in a dream for unmarried women according to Ibn Sirin Walking on water in a dream for a single woman Experts indicate that a girl walking on water in a dream expresses her good morals and the good path she takes in life and brings her goodness and food, if the water is good and clean. While walking in polluted water, it expresses the abundance of sins and the pursuit of corruption in life, which makes her surrounded by sins and bad deeds that make people hate her, in addition to God’s wrath for her actions. If she looks forward while walking on water, this means that the path is easy for her and she moves amazingly towards her desires without fear of the unknown. However, if she is agitated while walking and feels that she will fall at any moment, the dream indicates her constant tension about her future, although she plans well, but the state of anxiety clings to her and hits her hard. If the girl doubts the actions of some people around her and finds herself standing very firmly above the surface of the water, this means that these doubts will be removed from her and her psychological peace soon, if God willing. Walking on water in a dream for unmarried women according to Ibn Sirin. Among the indications of walking on water in Ibn Sirin's interpretation is that it is an indication of good behavior, approaching religion, not violating its commandments, as well as staying away from injustice and many sins. People's intense affection for the girl and their desire to approach her and interact with her becomes clear when she sees this dream, which is a sign of pleasure and happiness. If the unmarried woman is studying during her vision and faces some problems in this matter, it is expected that her academic condition will improve and she will excel highly in the future, God willing. In the case of her work, Ibn Sirin says that she may receive a large reward or a distinguished promotion that she has waited for a long time and worked hard for. As for walking in the water itself and not above it, it is evidence of the girl's religious empowerment, control over beautiful things on her, avoiding corruption, and her constant fear of God. And if you see her walking on it and she is not exposed to drowning at all, then she begins to change a certain matter related to her life and change it a lot so that it is characterized by beauty and positivity, God willing. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian dream interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by the most important jurists of interpretation. The most important Interpretations of walking on water in a dream for a single woman I dreamed that I was walking on water It can be said that the dream of an unmarried woman that she is walking on water is evidence of the beautiful things that she does in reality in general and helps to raise her status with others and brings blessings to her life with the satisfaction of God

The most important interpretations of walking on water in a dream for a single woman. I dreamed that I was walking on water. It can be said that a dream An unmarried woman walking on water is evidence of the beautiful things she does in reality in general and helps raise her status with others and brings blessings to her life with God’s approval.

title: Interpretation of feeding a hungry cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin for good and evil

preview.html: In this article from the Encyclopedia of Interpretations of Feeding a Hungry Cat in a Dream, we show you in detail cats, one of the most important pets that some people prefer to grow and care for at home and in the world of dreams. One of the most common visions that the dreamer sees on different occasions, either as a pet or as an animal. The wild animal attacks the dreamer, and the interpretations of this dream differ in each case of a cat, and feeding cats in a dream is one of the good deeds from which a person receives reward and reward, but it is a good vision for the dreamer to see. Do you feed a cat in a dream? You can see this in the following lines. Interpretation of feeding a hungry cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin The dream interpreter Ibn Sirin mentioned that if the dreamer sees himself feeding a cat in a dream, this symbolizes the dreamer’s tendency toward independence. Seeing feeding a cat in a dream reflects the stable life that the dreamer enjoys with His family. If the cat that the dreamer is feeding is female, then this is a good vision for the dreamer and expresses the arrival of goodness and happiness to him. But in the case of a male cat, this is a hateful dream for the dreamer and indicates that he is being deceived by one of his acquaintances in reality, whether friends or others. When you dream of feeding a white cat In a dream, this is one of the dreams promising the coming of a lot of goodness to the dreamer. If the dreamer dreams of feeding a hungry cat, this is an unwelcome sign that his condition will change for the worse, and God knows best. Imam Al-Sadiq mentioned that seeing a cat being fed in a dream indicates the disappearance of worries, and the end of Crises that one suffers from, and a change in the situation for the better. If the dreamer feeds the cat with meat in a dream, this is an unfavorable vision for him and indicates that the dreamer has been deceived and betrayed by his life partner. Among the undesirable symbols that jurists mention in interpreting dreams about feeding a cat In a dream, it indicates the presence of an evil woman in the dreamer’s life who should pay attention to her and warn her. Seeing a cat feeding a married woman in a dreamWhen a married woman dreams of feeding a cat in a dream, this indicates her love for goodness, and it is also an indication of her good qualities of generosity. Carrying this The vision is an unpleasant interpretation of the vision, which is wasting time doing things that are not useful. If you see a cat in general in a dream, this is a sign that you will be exposed to betrayal and deception, and the vision brings you a good interpretation of having children soon, and God knows best. Black cats symbolize a woman’s dream If a pregnant woman dreams that she is feeding a cat in a dream, this is a sign of the mercy that the dreamer has. For a pregnant woman, this vision also symbolizes her good health. Generally a vision Cats in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate the birth of a boy, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself being attacked by cats in a dream, this indicates the problems he faces during pregnancy. If a pregnant woman sees that she is killing cats in a dream, this is an unpleasant vision for her that expresses Insight's injustice

title: The 8 most famous interpretations of seeing eyelashes in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing eyelashes removed in a dream? Evidence of an enemy plotting against the dreamer. What does it mean to see eyelashes falling in a dazzling manner? It indicates the dreamer’s departure from God Almighty. What is the interpretation of seeing removable eyelashes in a girl’s dream? Things to get rid of all the problems that This girl is going through it. The meaning of seeing long eyelashes? Evidence of the emotional happiness enjoyed by the divine. What is the interpretation of seeing eyelashes in a married woman’s dream? Elements of her plan to take action. Interpretation of a dream about eyelashes by Ibn Sirin. Removing eyelashes in a dream is evidence that the enemy is conspiring against the dreamer. Whoever sees in a dream thick eyelashes growing on the eyelids, this indicates awakening from indifference and paying attention to not falling behind in worship. Whoever sees in a dream that he is plucking eyelashes, this indicates that the dreamer does not follow Sharia law. Then seeing eyes without eyelashes, this indicates that the dreamer He is one who issues religious fatwas and does not follow the teachings of God Almighty. Then, when seeing the eyelashes falling in an amazing way, this indicates the dreamer’s distance from God Almighty. Long eyelashes are evidence of the emotional happiness that the viewer enjoys. The growth of new eyelashes on the eyelids proves that he follows matters of religion Interpretation of dreams about eyelashes for single women. If a girl sees in a dream that she is putting liquor on her eyelashes and taking care of them, this indicates the approaching date of the wedding. So, seeing eyelashes removed in a girl’s dream is evidence of getting rid of all the problems that this girl faces. Then seeing the girl in Dreaming that she is applying eyelashes in the dream is evidence that she has changed her life for the better. Removing eyelashes in a girl’s dream can indicate marital infidelity and lack of debt. If she sees someone removing her eyelashes in a dream, this indicates advice she will receive from someone. Seeing a dream about eyelashes for a married woman Removing Eyelashes from a married woman’s dream are evidence of the stability of her married life. After that, seeing the removal of a married woman’s eyelashes in a dream is evidence of getting rid of problems and fears. After that, seeing eyelashes in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she is planning to do something. Interpretation of a dream about eyelashes for a pregnant woman can Removing eyelashes in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of stress and the need to take care of the fetus. So, seeing eyelashes removed in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of an easy birth. Then seeing eyelashes growing inside the eyes shows that they know the right path. Interpretation of a dream about eyelashes for a man: Seeing a man with eyelashes in a dream Evidence of worship, prayer, and fasting. After that, seeing a man removing a man’s eyelashes in a dream is evidence that he himself is an enemy. Eyelashes falling from the eyes prove this man’s departure from religion. Then, seeing thick eyelashes in a dream is evidence that you are hearing happy news. Then seeing Falling eyelashes are evidence of a man's connection to his life.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing henna in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing henna in a dream With the passage of time, women became famous for using henna on occasions, and the custom has not stopped until now because of that, and because of the beauty of the engravings that women make, they are prepared in this way. Seeing henna in a dream is a comfortable and happy dream, but there are some places that are hinted at on occasions apart from parties. And decorations, and in this article we will learn about them in detail. What is the interpretation of seeing henna in a dream? The interpretation of seeing henna in a dream explains that the dreamer is an ideal personality in his behavior and standards, and avoids creating any evil or disobedience that could destroy him. The vision expresses freedom from worries and sorrows and living With calm and stability. It is also a clear indication that God Almighty has accepted his deeds, repented, and become one of the righteous, so he should thank God forever and glorify Him for this great blessing. We also find that it is an expression of solving the problems that the dreamer faced in his life and that his Lord honors him with great joy that makes him happy. For life. If there are some charlatans near him, this is evidence of the need to pay attention to them, because he must wake up from his neglect so as not to be harmed by their evil and continue on the path of justice and happiness. Seeing them on the fingers is a sign of happiness and joy and at the same time a warning against falling into sin or Confronting bad friends who allow mistakes. It can also be a sign of progress at work and reaching a great position that everyone envy, especially if the dreamer exaggerates his status. The vision shows that the dreamer has the qualities of justice and compassion, so he is very successful in his life and work matters. The opinion of some jurists is that henna expresses the increase in money and children and the great benefit that it brings to the dreamer with goodness, and the desires that he is surprised by that were fulfilled as he wanted. Seeing her covering her hands is good for the righteous and the corrupt, because whoever does not care about his religion is evidence that he is diligent in the forbidden path. This does not bring him good. Between his children. The dream shows the kindness of the partner and this makes life full of love and endless optimism. Interpretation of seeing henna in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Our greatest imam, Ibn Sirin, explains to us that seeing it is evidence of happiness and comfort, especially if it is in poetry, and it also expresses the closest happy marriage for the pioneer If there are fears within the dreamer and he sees this dream, then he should know that his Lord gives him good news of safety and not fear these matters because he will overcome them without any harm. The vision is a sign of repentance for the wrong actions that the dreamer was doing in the past. It also indicates the good character that belongs to him. To the dreamer, he is always close to his Lord, and always feels grateful for all his blessings, especially if he puts henna on his fingers. Henna is a sign of great and never-ending family happiness, but if the dreamer refuses to put it on his hand, then here the vision leads to not feeling comfortable with the partner. Among the undesirable signs that Ibn Shirin told us about seeing henna: Removing it after applying it does not bode well, as the dream leads to worry and anxiety in the dreamer’s life, and he tries as much as possible to avoid it.

title: What is the interpretation of washing clothes in a dream?

preview.html: This is the interpretation of washing clothes in a dream, and it is one of the strangest dreams that people may see in their dreams, and scholars have differed in the interpretation of washing clothes in a dream. Fears and sorrows, and here we find that the determining factor is the same vision that the dreamer sees in his dream, depending on the type of dirty clothes and the condition of the dreamer at that time, and the vision differs if the dreamer is single, married or pregnant. All of these questions are what we will answer in detail, according to what the elder sees. Commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen in the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of washing clothes in a dream. Interpretation of clothes in a dream. Commentators on clothing in general agreed on covering a person’s private parts and a means of preserving his dignity and prestige, and they said that a garment in a dream may symbolize a husband or wife. Scientists also believe that New clothes or clothes in a dream are better than old, worn, and torn clothes, and clean clothes are better than worn out, dirty clothes, as we will explain later. Interpretation of washing clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing washing clothes in a dream indicates the many sins committed by the dreamer and his desire to purify and get rid of them. Of his sins. Or that washing clothes in a dream could be a sign of the dreamer’s desire to put an end to and get rid of the differences that dominate his thinking, whether at work or at home. But if the dreamer finds his clothes in his sleep dirty, impure, or torn, this indicates that the dreamer He carries a lot of sins and washes them, this is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to be cleansed of sins and transgressions. However, if the dreamer’s clothes are wet or the dreamer got them wet in his dream, this is an indication that he will feel distressed or that he will face obstacles on his way or in his travels or in a new job that he will accept and he may He loses it. And God Almighty is All-Knowing. Interpretation of washing clothes in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi confirmed that whoever dreams that he is washing his own clothes or the clothes of others, this is an indication of his deteriorating condition, his livelihood, and the problems he faces. As for the one who thinks that he is washing dirty clothes, this indicates his many sins and his desire to repent. Interpretation of washing Clothes in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen differed from Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin in washing clothes; Because he believes that whoever sees in his dream that he is washing clothes is a sign of the beginning of the dreamer’s new life without problems, sorrows and worries, and that it will remain. Away from everything that is bad around him. The vision of Ibn Shaheen washing dirty clothes in particular shows the dreamer’s salvation from all evil people in his life, especially those who caused him psychological harm or great harm to him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of washing clothes in A dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl or who has never been married before sees that she is washing clothes in her dream, this means that she is busy thinking seriously about her marriage, and a girl washing these clothes in a dream means that she will be exposed to a lot. Problems that may hinder her or her marriage, especially financial problems. If a girl washes clothes other than her own in her dream, this indicates that she will benefit from the one whose clothes she washed with something, a gift, or a job opportunity.

Away from everything that is bad around him. The vision of Ibn Shaheen washing dirty clothes in particular shows the dreamer’s salvation from all evil people in his life, especially those who caused him psychological harm or great harm to him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of washing clothes in A dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl or who has never been married before sees that she is washing clothes in her dream, this means that she is busy thinking seriously about her marriage, and a girl washing these clothes in a dream means that she will be exposed to a lot. Problems that may hinder her or her marriage, especially financial problems. If a girl washes clothes other than her own in her dream, this indicates that she will benefit from the one whose clothes she washed with something, a gift, or a job opportunity.
